type: Tutorial Step - Let's Add Your Review!

definition.text: In this step, you are going to run your first command to create a review page! This page will be yours to edit in the future too!

paragraphs.text: The syntax to write commands is quite colloquial! You'll love it! Check it out and follow the instructions below!
docs.add Review to Superalgos: Superalgos Project Review->Superalgos Review - YOUR REVIEW TITLE
SECOND: Paste it on a text editor.
THIRD: Replace YOUR REVIEW TITLE with a meaningful title for your review.
FOURTH: Paste the updated command on the search/command box and click Enter.
